txt.en:
'As you may or may not be aware, a party of visitors from far away lands is preparing to depart. Some of them are of high name, and it is meet that they set forth with all of the provisions they need.

'For that reason, I would have you hunt the badgers of the High Moor and bring me their pelts. These will make warm gloves and hood-linings for the travellers.

'Will you aid me with this?'
Collect badger-pelts on the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected badger-pelts on the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Elf-scout Canaddal is concerned with outfitting and provisioning a party of visitors to Rivendell as they prepare to depart.
Badgers can be found throughout the High Moor, in the Trollshaws.\n\nCanaddal has asked you to hunt badgers for their pelts.
'Ah, thank you, [placeholder]! These will do nicely.'
'Have you brought the pelts I requested?'
Canaddal is posted at the head of the path leading down to the Bruinen Gorges from the High Moor.\n\nYou should bring the badger-pelts you collected to Canaddal.
